title: New: Arqestry – Fell
content:
With the rise of new 4AD signee SOHN, we can be expected to hear a noticeable increase in the number of experimental, electronic ‘sadcore’ artists, much like Grimes leading the way for a horde of quirky female singers.

Arqestry may take the pitch-shifted vocals to the extreme, and the veiled R&B inspirations prove almost over-powering at times, yet there’s a subtle genius to the simplicity of Arqestry’s music. His debut track, Fell, is a collision of irregular synths sections and looped, auto-tuned vocals, mystically haunting and ever-so unnerving. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
